scripts.e2e-test-wdio-mocha: npm run screenshots-clean; npm run allure-clean; npx wdio run ./wdio-mocha.conf.js

scripts.e2e-test-wdio-cucumber-bs-p1: npm run screenshots-clean; npm run allure-clean; npx wdio run ./wdio-cucumber-bs-p1.conf.js; echo $BS_TESTOPS_BUILD_HASHED_ID
